## Choosing model structure

+--------------------+----------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
|                    | Cohort                                             | Individuals                                                 |
+====================+====================================================+=============================================================+
| **No interaction** | Decision tree                                      | Simulated decision tree                                     |
|                    |                                                    |                                                             |
|                    | (Semi-)Markov discrete time state transition model | Simulated cohort model (discrete time steps)                |
|                    |                                                    |                                                             |
|                    |                                                    | Discrete event continuous time simulation                   |
+--------------------+----------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| **Interaction**    | Compartmental differential equations model         | Discrete event simulation (capacity limits, queues, delays) |
|                    |                                                    |                                                             |
|                    | Difference equation approximation                  | Agent based model (contagion, complex interactions)         |
|                    |                                                    |                                                             |
|                    | System dynamics model                              |                                                             |
+--------------------+----------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
